tool_description: Analyzes portfolio allocation across different dimensions including asset types, market caps, sectors, and geographic regions.

asset_values.description: Current values of each asset in portfolio

minimum_allocation_threshold.description: Minimum allocation percentage to include in detailed analysis

error_messages: Array length mismatch: asset_symbols and asset_values arrays must have the same length.
Invalid asset value: All asset values must be positive numbers.
Unsupported analysis dimension: Use supported dimensions like market_cap, asset_type, blockchain, or sector.
Threshold out of range: minimum_allocation_threshold must be between 0.1 and 10.0.
usage: Provide asset_symbols and corresponding asset_values arrays. Configure analysis_dimensions and minimum_allocation_threshold as needed. Returns detailed allocation breakdown across specified dimensions.

market_cap_allocation.description: Allocation percentages across market cap categories

allocation_warnings.description: Warnings about concentration or allocation issues
